Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money
Reviews.Author: Jill M. Miller
Reviews.Content: Don't waste your money. This camera sucks. Only records a couple of minutes then it shuts off. And with no remote, it's a pain in the neck to keep turning it on again.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: Samuel Detore
Reviews.Content: It's not a go pro but I will say this you'll never have go pro company put out something as good as this for the price got seven mounts camera view finder sd card for 40 bucks and I've recorded a handful of videos out in 79 acres of hard riding and honestly can not complain video does cut out some times when I plug into lap top but to be fare lap top does need some cleaning out,

Reviews.Title: It's cool
Reviews.Author: JDW
Reviews.Content: It's a cool little camera for the price I paid, but the battery doesn't last very long.I wish it had other mounting capabilities besides the strap and the sticky mount.  I use it running so I don't have a helmet and I don't like wearing it strapped to my head. Also it only picks up close sounds, I wish it could pick up back ground sounds better.

ProductInfo.Features:
Includes the following accessories- helmet mount, adhesive mount, protective or mounting case, USB connection
Video- VGA resolution (640x480) at 30 frames per second, QVGA resolution (320x240) at 60 frames per second, Photos- 640x380 resolution
128MB of on-board memory, MicroSD card slot to add more memory
Rechargeable lithium polymer battery with USD charger
ProductInfo.Name: Action Shot Camera
